attributes.title: 0.1 - The Pilot
attributes.caption: The One About Persona 5 and Streaming
attributes.description: Join Ashley, Gus, and Ryan as they discuss the value of streaming games (11:54), Persona 5 (23:22), this week's news (45:35), and Ryan explains what the Xbox Scorpio's hardware stats really mean! (1:14:47)

attributes.title: 0.2 - Nostalgia Money
attributes.caption: The One About Yooka Laylee and Prey
attributes.description: Ashley, Ryan, and Miles talk about the latest happenings in video games (7:55) their thoughts on Yooka-Laylee (33:23) cashing in on nostalgia with Tim Gettys (48:08) and early hands-on impressions of Prey (1:09:48)

attributes.title: 0.3 - Enter the Dragon
attributes.caption: The one with weird drinks and Reina Scully
attributes.description: Join Ashley, Gus, and special guest Reina Scully this week as they pitch their ideas for games based on your submissions (4:24) cast a movie version of The Witcher (18:38) spotlight indie games they love (44:22) and speedrun the news! (57:51)

attributes.title: 0.4 - The Definitive Blue Shell
attributes.caption: The one about Mario Kart and Switch accessories
attributes.description: Take a 200cc ride with Ashley, Gus, Ryan, and Adam as they Speedrun the News (2:25) have a deluxe discussion about Mario Kart (33:00) weigh the value of remakes and remasters (58:25) and highlight their favorite Switch accessories (1:16:10)

attributes.title: 0.5 - Prey for a Comeback
attributes.caption: The one about Prey and mailbags
attributes.description: Question the very coffee cup in your hand as Ashley, Gus, Ryan, and Mica speedrun the news (2:34) are joined by Miles to discuss Prey (34:10) wish for old franchises to be brought back (1:02:09) and answer your emails (1:17:15)

attributes.title: 0.6 - The Final Countdown
attributes.caption: The one about crowdfunding and Night in the Woods
attributes.description: In our last pilot episode Ashley, Gus, Ryan, and Adam speedrun all the Destiny 2 news and more (19:38) Discuss dead malls in Night in the Woods (52:40) and take stock of crowdfunding's current health (1:03:18)
